map-vis-in-situ-control
directive in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Directive to control addition of in-situ data to the visualization map.

Usage

as element:
<map-vis-in-situ-control
       layer="{object}">
</map-vis-in-situ-control>

Directive info

  • This directive creates new scope.

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
layerobject

The currently selected map layer.
